sourceDesc.p: Produced from collation output prepared in batch file processing on 2018-10-04 16:58:37.992715 .
Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2019-03-15T23:33:25.137-04:00.

body.ab: This time <lb n="c56-0020__main__10"/> was spent sadly. My mothers death <lb n="c56-0020__main__11"/> and my speedy departure depressed <lb n="c56-0020__main__12"/> our spirits but Elizabeth endeavour<lb n="c56-0020__main__13"/>ed to <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0020__main__d2e3862"/>spr<del eID="c56-0020__main__d2e3862"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0020__main__d2e3865"/>renew<del eID="c56-0020__main__d2e3865"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0020__main__d2e3868"/>the spirit<del eID="c56-0020__main__d2e3868"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0020__main__d2e3871"/>cast aa gleam<del eID="c56-0020__main__d2e3871"/>renew the spirit of cheer <lb n="c56-0020__main__14"/> fullness in our little society. Since <lb n="c56-0020__main__15"/> the death of her aunt her mind <lb n="c56-0020__main__16"/>had acquired new <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0020__main__d2e3896"/>firmess<del eID="c56-0020__main__d2e3896"/> firmness and <lb n="c56-0020__main__17"/> vigour. She determined to fulfil her <lb n="c56-0020__main__18"/> duties with the greatest exactitude <lb n="c56-0020__main__19"/> and <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0020__main__d2e3908"/>her<del eID="c56-0020__main__d2e3908"/>she felt that the most imperious duty <del next="#c56-0020.09" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0020__main__d2e3915"/>was<del eID="c56-0020__main__d2e3915"/>of<lb n="c56-0020__main__20"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0020__main__d2e3923" xml:id="c56-0020.09"/>to<del eID="c56-0020__main__d2e3923"/> rendering her uncle and cousins hap<lb n="c56-0020__main__21"/>py.<lb n="c56-0020__left_margin__1"/> had devolved <lb n="c56-0020__left_margin__2"/> on her. She consoled me, amused her uncle, <lb n="c56-0020__main__22"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0020__main__d2e3954"/>and<del eID="c56-0020__main__d2e3954"/> instructed my brothers and I
